summary: Adds three new expansive rooms with leveled content to the Dwemer War Quarters in Blackreach, which was previously a small room with no enemies.
descriptionHtml:
When the Dwemer mysteriously and suddenly disappeared, most of their cities were left defenseless, to be pillaged and destroyed by time. Today, only the most well-defended Dwemer fortresses remain.

The Dwemer War Quarters is one such fortress, barely touched by the passage of time. Not a soul has yet been able to pass the entrance chamber to steal the contents far within. Dwemer Spiders maintain the War Quarters in their masters' absence, such that it remains a near-spotless vestige of Dwemer civilization. It remains, due to the excessive military might of the Dwemer, which remains, asleep within the War Quarters.

Powerful, forgotten weaponry remains forgotten, deep within the halls of the War Quarters. Secret dwemer military technology can be found in the deepest places, such as Dwemer Flintlock rifles (by Ghosu).


SUGGESTED MODS
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63022/]Dwemer Spectres[/url] - Adds a chance to spawn a Dwemer Spectre instead of vanilla Sphere Centurions and Spiders!


COMPATIBILITY
3DNPC (Immersive NPC's) - Load this afterwards. Unfortunately will replace the Dwemer AI 'Relic'. A compatibility patch should move him to the Dwemer Pumphouse nearby.
author: TwinCrows
